Title: Pre-existing alc_enc cookies log users in if remember me is disabled
Description: If remember me is on and users log in with the box checked, if the developer then disabled "remember me" function, any pre-existing cookies will continue to authenticate users.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.1.20, all versions starting from 3.2.0-alpha0 before 3.2.5, all versions starting from 3.3.0-alpha0 before 3.3.3, all versions starting from 3.4.0-alpha0 before 3.4.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.1.20-stable before 3.2.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.2.5-stable before 3.3.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.3.3-stable before 3.4.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.4.1-stable
